con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="RoomPlannerServiceService" targetNamespace="http://roomplanner/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://roomplanner/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://roomplanner/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="doPlan" type="tns:doPlan"/> <xs:element name="doPlanResponse" type="tns:doPlanResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="doPlan"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomList" type="tns:room"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomCategoryList" type="tns:roomCategory"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="reservationList" type="tns:reservation"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomAssignmentList" type="tns:roomAssignment"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="room"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="roomCategory" type="tns:roomCategory"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="adults" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nonSmoking" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="roomCategory"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="reservation"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="roomCategory" type="tns:roomCategory"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bookingInterval" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="adults" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nonSmoking" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="roomAssignment"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="room" type="tns:room"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="reservation" type="tns:reservation"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="moveable" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="doPlanResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="plan" type="tns:plan"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="plan"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roomAssignments" type="tns:roomAssignment"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="score" type="tns:score"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="score"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="feasible" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hardScoreConstraints" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="softScoreConstraints" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="doPlan"> <wsdl:part element="tns:doPlan" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="doPlanResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:doPlanResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="RoomPlannerService"> <wsdl:operation name="doPlan"> <wsdl:input message="tns:doPlan" name="doPlan"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:doPlanResponse" name="doPlanResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RoomPlannerServiceServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:RoomPlannerService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="doPlan"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="doPlan"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="doPlanResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="RoomPlannerServiceService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:RoomPlannerServiceServiceSoapBinding" name="RoomPlannerServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/RoomPlanner/services/roomPlanner"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:room="http://roomplanner/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <room:doPlan> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <roomList id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <roomCategory id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <name>?</name> </roomCategory> <!--Optional:--> <name>?</name> <!--Optional:--> <adults>?</adults> <!--Optional:--> <nonSmoking>?</nonSmoking> </roomList> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <roomCategoryList id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <name>?</name> </roomCategoryList> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <reservationList id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <roomCategory id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <name>?</name> </roomCategory> <!--Optional:--> <bookingInterval>?</bookingInterval> <!--Optional:--> <adults>?</adults> <!--Optional:--> <nonSmoking>?</nonSmoking> </reservationList> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <roomAssignmentList id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <room id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <roomCategory id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <name>?</name> </roomCategory> <!--Optional:--> <name>?</name> <!--Optional:--> <adults>?</adults> <!--Optional:--> <nonSmoking>?</nonSmoking> </room> <!--Optional:--> <reservation id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <roomCategory id="?"> <!--Optional:--> <name>?</name> </roomCategory> <!--Optional:--> <bookingInterval>?</bookingInterval> <!--Optional:--> <adults>?</adults> <!--Optional:--> <nonSmoking>?</nonSmoking> </reservation> <!--Optional:--> <moveable>?</moveable> </roomAssignmentList> </room:doPlan> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: doPlan
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:room="http://roomplanner/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <room:doPlan>
<!--Room Categories--> <roomCategoryList id="1"/> <roomCategoryList id="2"/> <roomCategoryList id="3"/> <roomCategoryList id="4"/> <roomCategoryList id="5"/>
<!--Rooms--> <roomList id="1"> <roomCategory id="1"/> <adults>1</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="2"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="3"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <adults>3</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="4"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <adults>4</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="5"> <roomCategory id="5"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="6"> <roomCategory id="1"/> <adults>1</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="7"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="8"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <adults>3</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="9"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <adults>4</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="10"> <roomCategory id="5"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="11"> <roomCategory id="1"/> <adults>1</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="12"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="13"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <adults>3</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="14"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <adults>4</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="15"> <roomCategory id="5"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="16"> <roomCategory id="1"/> <adults>1</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="17"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="18"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <adults>3</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="19"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <adults>4</adults> </roomList> <roomList id="20"> <roomCategory id="5"/> <adults>2</adults> </roomList>
<!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <reservationList id="1"> <roomCategory id="1"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>2</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="2"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>3</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="3"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>1</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="4"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>3</adults> </reservationList> <reservationList id="5"> <roomCategory id="5"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>4</adults> </reservationList>
</room:doPlan> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:response.name: Response 1
con:response.con:responseContent: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns2:doPlanResponse xmlns:ns2="http://roomplanner/"> <plan> <roomAssignments id="0"> <room id="2"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <adults>2</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </room> <reservation id="1"> <roomCategory id="1"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>2</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </reservation> <moveable>true</moveable> </roomAssignments> <roomAssignments id="1"> <room id="3"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <adults>3</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </room> <reservation id="2"> <roomCategory id="2"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>3</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </reservation> <moveable>true</moveable> </roomAssignments> <roomAssignments id="2"> <room id="8"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <adults>3</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </room> <reservation id="3"> <roomCategory id="3"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>1</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </reservation> <moveable>true</moveable> </roomAssignments> <roomAssignments id="3"> <room id="4"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <adults>4</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </room> <reservation id="4"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>3</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </reservation> <moveable>true</moveable> </roomAssignments> <roomAssignments id="4"> <room id="9"> <roomCategory id="4"/> <adults>4</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </room> <reservation id="5"> <roomCategory id="5"/> <bookingInterval>10000-20000</bookingInterval> <adults>4</adults> <nonSmoking>true</nonSmoking> </reservation> <moveable>true</moveable> </roomAssignments> <score> <feasible>false</feasible> <hardScoreConstraints>-1.0</hardScoreConstraints> <softScoreConstraints>-70.0</softScoreConstraints> </score> </plan> </ns2:doPlanResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
